short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the centrality of npm packages and check if a package is in decline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will embed the centrality chart and the status (if the centrality in decline or not) for npm packages when you browse a package on npmjs.com.
